ygData.subject: The cache constraint
ygData.msgSnippet: Is caching a necessary constraint from an arch style pov? It seems like a consequence/benefit of the other constraints (cs/layered/stateless/uniform interface)

Is caching a necessary constraint from an arch style pov?

It seems like a consequence/benefit of the other constraints 
(cs/layered/stateless/uniform interface) rather than one in its own right

Cheers,
Mike
